ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] On binding
ygData.msgSnippet: In Verant s vision Non-Casters are the whipping boys of the real characters.  Anybody know where Selma s equivalent might be in Norrath? Kit ... From: Papa
ygData.messageBody:
In Verant's 'vision' Non-Casters are the whipping boys of the real
characters. Anybody know where Selma's equivalent might be in Norrath?

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Papa Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 30, 2000 2:05 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] On binding


Binding has become the poster child for what is wrong with Verant. 95%
of the EQ players would be happy/inddiferent to Verant adding some
equivalent of Lifestones (yes I've been cheating on EQ with AC, viva La
Diferance!).

The programming would not be hard (an NPC who you give 1P to).

Why not do it? "Its not part of our vision."


--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
